headline: Is Becton Dickinson (BDX) Pricing Reflect The Gap Between Cash Flow Value And P/E Multiple
summary: Wondering if Becton Dickinson at around US$201.92 is offering fair value right now, or if the current price is out of line with the fundamentals you care about. The stock has seen a mix of short term resilience and longer term pressure, with a 2.1% decline over the last 7 days, a 3.5% gain over the last month, and a 3.6% gain year to date, alongside a 16.4% decline over the last year and a 16.2% decline over three years. Recent coverage has focused on Becton Dickinson as a large medical...

headline: BD and Envetec Demonstrate Closed-Loop Recycling Solution for Laboratory Plastics in Health Care
summary: BD (Becton, Dickinson and Company) (NYSE: BDX), a leading global medical technology company, and Envetec Sustainable Technologies ("Envetec"), announced today the successful completion of a joint feasibility study to test the ability to recycle polystyrene Petri dishes into new, high-quality manufacturing feedstock.

headline: 1 Cash-Producing Stock to Consider Right Now and 2 We Find Risky
summary: A company that generates cash isn’t automatically a winner. Some businesses stockpile cash but fail to reinvest wisely, limiting their ability to expand.
